briefdescription.para: YapTab extends the Yap Prolog engine to support sequential tabling.

detaileddescription.para: YapOr extends the Yap Prolog engine to support or-parallelism YapOr extends the Yap Prolog engine to support or-parallelism
Removes all the entries from the table space for predicate P (or a list of predicates P1,..., Pn or [ P1,..., Pn]) The predicate remains as a tabled predicate
